name: NewGalexy
description: NewGalexy Services is Scotland's first Legal Process Outsourcing (LPO) company. With its European onshore delivery centre based in the heart of Glasgow's International Financial Services District, NewGalexy provide legal support to large international corporations and leading law firms. Our company is deliberately focussed on matters which many in-house counsel and law firms find hard to complete efficiently and cost-effectively.
